name: Ladder Miner Online
description:
Hold F to place ladder

Press R to throw dynomyte (spelled that way on purpose(thats my friends name))

DYNAMITE DOES NOT GIVE YOU ORE!!

Mine but be careful! Dont run out of ladders!!!!

Made by Jaden Donald in Unity in 4 days

If you want to play over lan, just click host server/client on one PC and click client on the other!

If you want to play with friends online, you have to port forward port 7777 TCP, then you can get your IP from ipchicken.com

To play singleplayer you still have to click the host button!
